Hammer of Gond

Prerequisite: Artificer, must worship Gond
Benefit: You gain proficiency with the warhammer, and you can use it as an implement for your artificer powers and artificer paragon path powers. You can treat the warhammer as a heavy thrown weapon with a range of 6/12.

Published in Dragon Magazine 403.
